info.name: Netvibes Minimal & Clean
info.description:
Global UX & UI optimization

- Remove useless functionnalities
- Remove every distractions (borders, shadows, rounded corners, personalizable header...)
- Fix fonts problems
info.additionalInfo:
Works with following Mode : 
- Condensed mode
- List with images

Better render with Fira Sans (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Fira+Sans)
Only works with "Condensed" display 
Hasn't been tested with "Feed mode"

Some useless functionnalities have been remove : 
- Collapse all
- Header background
- Header title
- Charts icon (Premium option)
